website_summaries.verdict: A simple farmhouse table that won't break the bank. This casual piece has the right amount of personality and practicality.
pros: Heavy, sturdy piece for a table of this size
cons: Consumers reported that a few units arrived with dents in the tabletop

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The table is great! It certainly came in well packaged/well protected. It was sort of hard to actually get to the table lol But it all went together smoothly and was definitely a beautiful, solid piece. My only complaint was, somehow, the hardware bag came loose so all the pieces were scattered in the box. Turns out I was only missing (1) flat washer, which I could do without. All together, its an easy to put together and heavy piece that is absolutely beautiful! Definitely a table for 2, maybe 4 depending on how much elbow room you want. We only needed 2.
customer_reviews.author: A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Kitchens/Apartments
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment, and this is a small table which is perfect! Do yourself a favor and make sure you measure out the dimensions in the room you plan on putting this table before you buy it! Some people complained and stated this is a kid's table. I'm an adult and use this as a normal, adult table lol. Seats 4 adults comfortably. 6 is crowded. 8 is not going to happen. Table arrived undamaged and in perfect condition. It's not wobbly at all. I've had my table for 1 year and it's still just as nice looking and non-wobbly as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: WatchTheShow

customer_reviews.title: I bought this table for a very small dining area ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for a very small dining area and it fits perfectly. The assembly amounted to attaching the legs which took about 10 min., and it went with the chairs I already owned. It definitely was well worth the money, seems solid, no visible scratches or dings. It was packaged in an outer box and an inner box. Getting the table unpackaged was probably the most difficult part.
customer_reviews.author: charlies mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and about the smell...
customer_reviews.text: About the smell -- my table was manufactured about a year ago, as indicated by the label attached to the underside of the table, and there is a very slight wood/varnish kind of smell coming from the table. It is not especially noticeable to me and does not bother me, but I can understand how people with sensitive noses could be bothered by it. The smell is getting less noticeable the day after I pulled the table out of its box (or maybe I am getting used to it) and I now have to put my nose right on the table surface to smell anything from it.
customer_reviews.author: austin944

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from Amazon Warehouse Deals and I could see why someone returned it. One leg was significantly lighter than the table and one was darker. It didn't bother me because I don't look down there that closely. I just put them on opposite corners and it is fine. The quality of the table is much better than the cheap tables you can get at furniture stores. Very easy to put together. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CandR

customer_reviews.title: Nice value!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very very nice. Solid REAL wood. The rounded edges are a nice touch. Great table for someone like me - a single bachelor living in a house alone looking for a small nice kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: TreyB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little table, exactly right for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to have my husband turn it into a sewing table. He did a beautiful job with it. Having said that, the table is solid wood with a very pretty grain. It's sturdy, well made and very nice looking. And for the price, I would never have been able to get a table this good anywhere else. I checked at Ikea, and their tables don't compare - and they're not solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great table that acts like a table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, it does exactly as advertised...All 4 legs touch the floor...You can put things on top like plates...All and all a great table.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy for a kitchen nook. I would've liked the height to be a couple inches taller, but it works fine. I also was impressed how little assembly there was. All I had to do was attach the legs with the hardware it came with. No added tools needed. Please note that the chairs are NOT included.
customer_reviews.author: Beki J

customer_reviews.title: Besides that it's a great table set for the space I needed
customer_reviews.text: One of the chairs came damaged. Scrapes and cracked wood on the upper portion. Besides that it's a great table set for the space I needed. 5/5 if the chair wasn't damaged. (It was the one flipped upside down in the box) so maybe they'll change their shipping method or add some other protective barrier to avoid it. Seems like it was a stress fracture from shipping and the people not knowing what's in the box I'll update this review with pictures of the damage later
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tawney

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for1
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed but am not sure how it would fit another persons needs. I am in a wheelchair and wanted a rectangular table that would hold my microwave with room for my knees underneath and extra room to the side to set dishes and food for preparation. I did not buy chairs for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yeah. This is a keeper for sure. Very good packaging with extra protection all around the edges. Not a bit of damage. The bolts and washers were just loose inside the box and I was 1 washer short but otherwise no problems. Assembly was quick and easy. The table is the perfect size for our small breakfast area. Roomy for two and perfectly adequate for four people. It's very attractive and has a quality feel. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Krische

customer_reviews.title: just poor workmanship. Value and quality are not apparent with ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality, craftsmanship and workmanship were not on the agenda during the time that my Coaster Country Butcher Block Oak and White table was made. It came with a pea size gash and unpainted streaks along the side frame of the table top. The legs are too small in diameter, resulting in a slight wobble. The table top is too light and thin. This table is poorly made. The defects were not a result of packaging and shipping, just poor workmanship. Value and quality are not apparent with this table. Coaster needs to improve this product and its quality control and warranty/replacement policy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The table itself is fine, solid wood and smaller sized like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is fine, solid wood and smaller sized like I wanted. However the one I received from this seller (Shop to Save) was NOT natural wood finished, but stained a light oak and even had handwritten notes on both the box and shipping box indicating that. This is not how they come from Coaster, something has been done to them. Don't purchase this table from this seller if you are trying to match natural wood finished chairs or are looking for a natural finish! Frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better
customer_reviews.text: The table is as described, however there was a small gash on the table top when I took it out of the box. The box was not damaged, thus it was packaged that way. In addition, I brought the chairs which are supposed to match the table (made by the same company), however the wood on the chairs is darker and shinier than the table top wood.
customer_reviews.author: breviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems.
customer_reviews.text: This table took WEEKS to arrive. The top IS NOT butcher block but rather has a fake wood veneer and it doesn't really match the chairs sold on Amazon that seem to look like it. I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Whales

customer_reviews.title: Love the table.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and fits perfectly in my small eat-in kitchen. Has a nice finish on the table and the legs are painted perfectly. No scratches or marks or blemishes. Great solid table. You do have to put the legs on the table after it arrives but everything was packed well and it even came with it's own little tools. I live alone so it's certainly big enough for me but it's also big enough to sit four around the table for a meal or to play scrabble! An excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This table is AWESOME! Fantastic deal at the right price. The wood is solid, no particle board or engineered sawdust boards, just high quality hardwoods. Very well designed and crafted. Assembled in less than 20 minutes and it arrived very well packaged. This is a great table for use as a food prep table in a kitchen or just an extra place to serve kids or coffee at home. You can't go wrong on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: The color of the table is not like the picture it shows here
customer_reviews.text: The color of the table is not like the picture it shows here. It is much much darker....It is not match the color of my kitchen at all. I hope they can take a picture for exactly color and put it here. It is so heavy and I do not want to return it back. Sigh~
customer_reviews.author: gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Although an inch on one side and an inch on the other may not seem like a big difference
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! SIZE IS NOT ACCURATE! Table size is actually 29" x 47" - NOT 30" x 48". Although an inch on one side and an inch on the other may not seem like a big difference, it actually is - especially when you buy this table to replace one that was exactly 30" x 48". It feels quite a bit smaller than the one I had, plus it's very lightweight so it constantly slides around without any effort at all. With that said, however, I actually really love the table and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MTLL

customer_reviews.title: but a good, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: A little small, but a good, sturdy table. Mine is 2 years old and still looks like new despite abuse from 3 kids and my leatherworking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Really solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well put together piece of furniture, especially when compared to other online products. The biggest thing that stuck out to me is that it came with not only flat washers, but split/locking washers to ensure the legs stay on as tight as possible. VERY easy to assemble, and makes a great addition to any apartment or breakfast nook. I very rarely give 5 stars, I reserve that rating for products that really "wow" me, and this did.
customer_reviews.author: athies22

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a project table for my living room. I live in a small apartment and needed a table for projects. My friend put gliders on this because it has to move frequently. Everyone who sees this product is amazed at how well it works for me. Also, it matches my dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Ann V

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful and stylish. I've been looking for a table with these dimensions in the style of a modern farmhouse and here it is. The legs have a beautiful design and they are thick enough for a rich look. The table top is a light lacquered brown wood, rich and quality looking. The table pair well with the Damen Napoleon Dining Side Chairs Natural Brown and White (Set of 2).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful opening!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, and easy to assemble. This is exactly what I wanted! However, all of my hardwear was scattered throught the box and not in any packaging whatsoever. I had to shake out the cardboard to find all my pieces. So be CAREFUL! or you will loose pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MelCoff2018

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Table is very solid and well built. Fairly easy to assemble and is perfect for a 2-3 person family. 4 would be a bit crowded on that table but is doable for meals table comes in box and is well padded with lots of protection
customer_reviews.author: R. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Got the birch
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Got the birch. I love it, its big enough for 4 people. But I live alone so I can move it easily when I switch apartments. It looks great and is real solid wood. Best table I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: the shopping box is good, it is the chair broken before in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The second time purchase, smaller than last time, and one chair was broken very badly ! Send email to ask no one review back , the shopping box is good , it is the chair broken before in the box or shopping drop on the way! Feel sad !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice jin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wood and quality
customer_reviews.text: This table is a perfect size for a small area and two people. The wood is beautiful and I have had compliments on it. It looks much more expensive than it was but we don't tell people that. It was quite easy to put together and it was shipped double packaged for protection. Over all,a Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Gutoski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing. The Butcher Block table came today. Wow! 2 DAY SHIPPING. It was well wrapped, Very well wrapped. Beautiful table. I am very pleased. Today is Saturday and the handy man wouldn't be able to assemble it until Tuesday. I read the reviews where a young child put the table together for his Mom. So I assembled it myself. Very easy. Also I was pleased with the tool included to do it my self. Gail F
customer_reviews.author: Gail Frances

customer_reviews.title: Not bad -
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this table, it's not cheap but not great, I'd say its serviceable..which is what you get for this price range. The one major knock I have on this table is the position of the screws (1) and the wrench that comes with the product (2). The placement of the screws already makes it incredibly difficult to tighten the legs, but also the wrench does not really wrap around the entire bolt, so it is twice as hard to do. When you're putting this together, make sure its done right the first time or good luck trying to tighten it later.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A good shopping
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived earlier than expected. It looks nice after opening the box. Its color is a little bit dark than the picture, but it doesn't impact its overall quality. Its size perfectly fits 4 persons at the table. And it is easy to install. The top is smooth and shining, no defect found. It is contributed by the good package, with 2 layers of boxes and extra protection :)
customer_reviews.author: jnypro

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great little table for the money. Very easy to put together. My mom needed this for her new Independent Sr Living apartment. It works out well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. I just ordered this table and got an all oak one without white legs. On top of that there is a big gouge in the top right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous table. Beautiful butcher block finish. Box was ripped, but not a scratch on it. Seat 4 easily. Just right for a kitchen. Great customer service, too. Couldn't find the hardware, and they were quick to order a replacement. Then, oops, found it, but it was taped under a flap on one of the table leg boxes. Heavy duty top that matched existing chairs perfectly. You cant go wrong with this purchase and the great price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great dining room table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I used to have another one just like it before we moved and had to dump most of our furniture because we moved to Hawaii and it would have cost too much to ship it (and most of it was very old). It fits well into our apartment. I didn't get the matching chairs because they don't look comfortable. I just now, months later, got around to buying some dining chairs. We don't really eat dinner at the table, but it's nice to have for other things, and it will be good for company.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lanoue

customer_reviews.title: We switched from our beautiful french style table to this table when we changed ...
customer_reviews.text: We switched from our beautiful french style table to this table when we changed our breakfast area to country and we like this better.
customer_reviews.author: ReeRee

customer_reviews.title: Using as a desk....
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this for a friend who had a similar table using as a desk and he wanted a second table to create an L shape. We looked for some time and then I went to Amazon and found this one. He loves it, it works just as he hoped and although not an exact match to his existing table it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mea Pie

customer_reviews.title: 5-star table for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a $100 table, I would definitely give this 5 stars. I am still using it 4 years later and it's as good as new. Sturdy and holds up. Not beautiful, but also not bad looking by any means. But like I said, $100.
customer_reviews.author: Sunyata

customer_reviews.title: Best buy , priced right too !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , fits right into the spot I had for it . Heavy ,solid and well built , easy to assemble too !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this table! I bought matching chairs to go with it. However, the matching chairs by Winsome Wood had to be returned due to the split down the seat! This table is a bit smaller than I expected from the measurements given but it's very pretty and designed beautifully too!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Whorton

customer_reviews.title: ... 10+ pieces of furniture and this may be my favorite. The white(s) look great and the table top ...
customer_reviews.text: Just recently moved and bought 10+ pieces of furniture and this may be my favorite. The white(s) look great and the table top is beautiful. Definitely recommend...winsome wood windsor chairs go great with this, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect table for 1-2 people!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table! I live in a studio apartment and this is exactly what I needed. Its large enough that I can fit quite a bit on it, but not so big that it's excessive for my small-ish apartment. I love being able to sit at my table in the morning and enjoy my breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White and Oak Dining Set
customer_reviews.text: We had tried to find a dinette set like this locally without success. I finally ordered this one through Amazon. It arrived quickly, was easy to assemble, and is just what we wanted. The back of one chair had been inadequately glued and came apart and had to be re-glued. The other three chairs were fine, however.
customer_reviews.author: AttaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Standard, but good
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking tablet. Bought it for a small apartment eat-in kitchen. Went together easily. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Paulie

customer_reviews.title: The wood is pretty, the table is HEAVY and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was MUCH higher quality than I expected and is exactly what I was looking for when I ordered it, thinking that I was settling for a lower quality piece. I'm thrilled! The wood is pretty, the table is HEAVY and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Meg e

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and the color is much lighter than it looks
customer_reviews.text: The table as far as tables go is fine. But its much lighter in color than it looks in the picture and it isn't as big as it looks either.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Exactly as described and looks perfect with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Exactly as described and looks perfect with suggested chairs also from Amazon. Clearly its no the most sturdy table in the world, I wouldn’t suggest adults sitting on it, but it serves its purpose as a kitchen table. Will last for a long time with regular use from a couple or small family. Keep in mind shipping is not fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking table. It's small, just big enough for 2 people to dine in. The wood is harder than pine, and cheaper than oak so it's a good table for the price. Assembly was easy, and they even included a disposable wrench. It's made in Malaysia. The packaging was really beat up, but it did it's job. The table itself was not damaged from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco-k1d

customer_reviews.title: The perfect table for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: love it, perfect for my small space and exactly what i have been looking for to match the chairs I got a few years ago and the price was great. The table is sturdy and attractive, very happy with my purchase, arrived quickly and easy to attach the legs and set right up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a very small dining area. Didn't expect much for the price but was surprised at the quality of the item. Easy to assemble. Packaged well. Very sturdy. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: This Table was packaged very, very well and I recieved it very fast just a couple of days, was easy to assemble and the quality is very , very good. I am very happy with this iteam and I recommend it to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice table nicely packaged and easy to assemble. Some of the wood grains have darker spots kind of annoying if your picky. But this does suit our smaller dinette area and matches the winsome chairs I purchased here nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable table; we use it as our kitchen table. Be sure you're ok with the table size as it relates to being proportionate to the space you're putting the table in. Upon putting the table together, we realized the space we have the table in makes the table look like a kids craft table or something. But super cute and we still have and use it!
customer_reviews.author: Luckylis

customer_reviews.title: Parents needed  a table
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a table in my area that I liked . And they were all cheeply made and they could not afford a real good made one . So I went on line and here it was so why not give it a shot and it was the best thing ever. They loved it and easy to put together and the nice thing it came to my door in 2 days. What a nice looking table solid and no marks on it. They are so happy with it .. A good buy.. We didn't get the chairs .
customer_reviews.author: sydneycobain

customer_reviews.title: Wow that is a nice table.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this table, I wasn't expecting much. Then when I got it is was amazed at how well it was put together. Good buy for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TheCaptain

customer_reviews.title: very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a long time for a small oak table like this. Made very well and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. It is sturdy, has a nice finish and has held up for over a year. I do not use it as a dining table, it is my computer desk. I feel comfortable having a three monitor stand with three 24 inch monitors, a speaker system, and a few other things on it at all times. If you are looking for a table that will do good under pressure this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen table for small space
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. When my table legs from my previous table did not arrive with my household goods delivery when I moved, I looked at a few local stores, but couldn't find what I was looking for. I looked on Anazon and found this table. It arrived in perfect condition (it was very well packed) and the legs attached easily. It fits in a small space in my dining area off my kitchen. I love it. I recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Their tagline says it all: Value, Style, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, beautiful finish! Solid natural wood, turned legs, no press board, composite wood products, etc. Easy assembly because of the excellent construction. Legs attached with 2 bolts per leg, basically had to tighten 8 nuts with included wrench! The hardest part of assembly was unpacking the table, standard cardboard box, with thin Styrofoam protecting top. Then they had external corner protection on all eight sides of box. No chairs included but not expected since add clearly stated Table, not table and chairs. Looking at all their products, I plan on buying from them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, nice looking, affordable. I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this table is for the price, also super easy to assemble, I put it together in about twenty minutes while sitting on my kitchen floor.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lockewood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ((Used for work tables))
customer_reviews.text: I have an in-home business and purchased two of these tables to use as a work station. I bought this particular style because they would be visible when company came and I wanted something a little nicer than a regular plastic table. They're fantastic. The wood is solid and the quality is superb. I will be purchasing the larger size to replace our dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little table. Came well packaged. 6 seats works well. This table is great for people who only take plates to the table, not serving dishes. And also great for people with kids who don't want to invest in something expensive that will likely get blueberry stains and permanent marker at some point. Good table for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. At the price I paid, even if I end up giving it away next time I move I think it was a good deal. Not sure how many people could comfortably sit at it at once, but it's been fine for two and probably would be acceptable for 4 as well (you could seat six, but probably not eat comfortably)
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: We've had this for 4 and a half years and it's still sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this table for 4 and a half years. It is still sturdy. It has been used every day as a dining table. It is definitely worth the price- we paid $127.31. For that price, this was a good deal. We got the Damen Rectangle Dining Table Natural.
customer_reviews.author: Lena D.

customer_reviews.title: Really good value
customer_reviews.text: We agreed to receive an all-oak table, very similar to the oak-and-white, because of shipping issues. It was extremely easy to put together, seems to be well designed and manufactured, and looks very good. We are happy to have it in our kitchen and have used it and admired it daily for five weeks. It looks a lot more expensive than the amount that we paid. Not super-sturdy, but with some care when moving it, we expect it to last and look good for a long time. We recommend it - money well spent !
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This table more than exceeded my expectations. It's not fancy, adorned or massively expensive. This fits in my small kitchen and does the job. The only thing I did not like was not being able to get the chairs that would match it in Alaska. It seems we Alaskans live in another country as far as some companies are concerned. Too bad, they miss out on a lot of sales.
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The underside support bar just beneat the table slab came out of the box cracked. The legs are beautiful, but the table top itself is a different wood stain and grain. It is also smaller than I envisioned, but it does meet the stated measurements. I will be using it as an additional table for company--so it will always have a cloth on it. For the price, it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: GailtheReader

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for my craft room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to use with my sewing machine in my newly developed craft room. The table is very sturdy and is a perfect size for using with my sewing machine. The wood is gorgeous, and my husband and I are considering purchasing a second table to use for our dining room. It is a bit smaller than a typical 4 person dining table, but I think it would work for us. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bonham

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this table
customer_reviews.text: Great table for a great price. It was delivered on time. My only (minor) complaint is that the hardware for the table was loose in the box and it took about ten minutes to find all 24 pieces (it should all be in a plastic bag). The floor-board pattern on the table top is very nice -- it's solid rubberwood, quite sturdy and extremely easy to assemble (they even provide the tool necessary for assembly). I'd definitely recommend this product. The packaging was very sturdy (hard to open though) and there was no damage to the table in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Anyuta Blagovo

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived the day after the matching pair of chairs that I ordered to go with it. I have a small kitchen and the set fits perfectly. The table came packaged very well and all I had to do was put the legs on which was a breeze and it looks great just as I imagined it would. I recommend this table which was not easily to find. It will seat four very comfortable. I may get a matching bench for the open side away from the wall sometime down the road. I am happy, thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Egleston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice small table. Should of read the description better. It does not come with any chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: table only chairs are extra $$
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table for our college son's apartment. It is the perfect size for his apartment. Solid wood construction and very very durable. Highly recommend for college kids. Too small for beer pong, but perfect for moving from apt. to apt. year after year. You have to buy the chairs separate, and they are very high quality as well. Was a very good price for the quality! Again, the chairs are not included.
customer_reviews.author: used to be a watergirl...

customer_reviews.title: Scratches Easily
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to assemble but it scratches very easily. I have had the table for about a month and the whole top is covered in scratches. The table is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: GREA TFOR SMALL APARTMENTS
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my apartment and for the price it looks really nice and I am sure that taken care of properly it will last me a lifetime!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Brady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table at an excellent price. Inexpensive, but built well. Shipped far faster than approximated. Had an issue with some missing hardware, but responded to an email the sender sent me unprompted asking if everything was OK. They made it more than right. Definitely a good seller and a good product (again, at its price point its amazing).
customer_reviews.author: LRob

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cutting table!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the purpose I bought it! I needed a cutting table for my sewing/quilting room. Tables made for that purpose were way overpriced. This one is tall enough to use for cutting without having to stoop which saves my back. It is small enough to fit in the room while large enough to lay out fabric. While it seems it would be tiny to use as a dining table, it is perfect as a craft table. Much better price for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Timbrook

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the money !
customer_reviews.text: I have had one before, still going strong after 14 years, won't warp etc. But be aware it is finger spliced wood and you can see, faintly the finger splice sawtooth pattern where the pieces are glued together, there is no stronger wood joint than that ! Looks just like butcher block only with a sawtooth at the joints instead of a straight glue joint, better in my opinion !
customer_reviews.author: brandon b

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Tablle
customer_reviews.text: I am quite impressed with the quality of this table - for the price that I paid! I had checked locally and couldn't see anything matching quality and price. There wasn't much assembly to do, but it was easy to do, and the only too needed is provided in the package.
customer_reviews.author: KS DEED

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but really small
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing wrong with this..but it us REALLY small. If you have 3 people at the table, it feels like you're in the other persons face. Plus...it kinda looks and feels like something you got on sale at Amazon ....if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: John Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought the table after putting hardwood floors in my kitchen and wanted a different look and more room changing out a round table. this table does both and it really is a strong table for the price! I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BettyG.

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice, feels sturdy and the wood seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this table, especially for the price! It looks very nice, feels sturdy and the wood seems to be good quality. You can comfortably fit 4 or squeeze in 6. The assembly was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: Marginal
customer_reviews.text: The table received was not the table displayed. The turns on the legs were different, one not two. One leg block which the leg screws to was mounted up-side down. Fortunitly I had the tools to remove it and turn it over. There was one small chip in the top. I would think twice before buying from these twice
customer_reviews.author: Jasper E Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the breakfast area of our kitchen, it fits perfectly and seats four comfortably. Attractive, well made and sturdy,
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann L

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for an apartment, not too big and love the color of the wood. Very easy to clean as well. It took longer to arrive than described on the page but I emailed the vendor and they were quick to send me a tracking number and let me know when it was shipped. Beautiful table.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: great table for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the table, IT DOES NOT COME WITH CHAIRS i originally thought it came with chairs but then i thought about it and realized that for that price it really wasn't possible lol so i bought two matching chairs and a bench and they look great together. the table is relatively small and fits in my small dinning space nicely
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: ... this table as a desk and work space - love it. It was very easy to assemble and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this table as a desk and work space - love it. It was very easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: NCHB

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table. We fit 4 comfortably at it, but I wouldn't add any more. It was easy to build and it is very pretty and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Coaster table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It has beautiful wood grain and it is great for the small area.I already had chairs and the table was a great match. I liked this table when I first saw it and the price was a contributing factor as well. I would not change a thing about the table. I highly recommend this table to my family and friends,
customer_reviews.author: Goldenlady2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My table was delivered today and I love it. I was able to put the legs on within a few minutes and it is set and ready to go. It is a perfect size and very sturdy. It will be used as a kitchen table/home work area for kids and should be perfect for both. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen set is beautiful. I purchased the 4 chairs and bench when ...
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen set is beautiful. I purchased the 4 chairs and bench when I ordered the table and I could not be more satisfied. It is very sturdy. I can see this set lasting for years to come. I would suggest buying the felt chair protectors. I am one happy lady with one beautiful kitchen set.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Costley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Wow... This is one table that was very very easy to assemble. It is also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: assembly was a bit slow since the bolts didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: assembly was a bit slow since the bolts didn't have space for the included hex-wrench to turn all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty table
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived today...went together real fast, 5 minutes. Just screw on 8 nuts with enclosed wrench. Only one problem: one washer was missing...had to go to a hardware store to buy one so I could use it right away. Small, cute, weighs about 45 pounds. Just right for my breakfast nook. Very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy in NJ

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very economical table I use it as a work station in my pantry. no chairs
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Used it for a sweetheart corner at a wedding, it drew a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: FunkyS

customer_reviews.title: Good table for small places.
customer_reviews.text: This table was perfect for my small apartment, it fit into a small "dinning area" and still left some room to maneuver around it. It is easy to assemble. My only "complaint" is that I wish the table legs were a little larger (diameter wise) more so for looks as opposed to functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Ed

customer_reviews.title: Not what picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Table has white painted legs and sides. I wanted an all 'natural' table. It was also missing a bolt/screw and a couple of washers. Unable to put together without going to home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the table was packaged really well. It was easy to put together. It's a solid table, and yet not so heavy that it's difficult to move it like antiques I looked at before buying this one. I find the light wood attractive. It fits in my small dining room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: peony

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the table and 2 chairs. It is a very nice set for the price. I love the wood and white contrast. Looks great in a small area.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl p. malin

product_meta.title: Damen Rectangle Dining Table Natural Brown and White
product_meta.description: Size:Natural and WhiteThis rustic dining table looks great in a cozy breakfast nook or dining area. Two-tone finish makes this table go great with two-tone dining chairs (not included). Brown solid wood table top is spacious enough for a large breakfast or four-course family dinner. Four white table legs have clean lines and offer durability. Table secretly doubles as a poker table.
feature_bullets: Finish Color: Natural brown and white

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars557 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
